entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
